title: Replace HVAC Filter
safety: Turn off the HVAC system before replacing the filter
Wear a dust mask to avoid inhaling particles
steps: Turn off your HVAC system at the thermostat
Locate the return air grille (usually on a wall or ceiling)
Remove the grille cover by lifting or unscrewing
Note the direction of airflow arrows on the old filter
Remove the old filter and dispose of it properly
Insert the new filter with airflow arrows pointing toward the unit
Replace the grille cover
Turn your HVAC system back on

title: Clean Gutters and Downspouts
safety: Use a sturdy ladder with a spotter
Never lean too far - move the ladder instead
Check weather conditions - avoid windy or wet days
steps: Set up ladder on level ground with a spotter
Remove large debris by hand or with gutter scoop
Work from downspout toward corners
Flush gutters with garden hose to check for proper drainage
Clear any clogs in downspouts with hose pressure
Inspect for loose brackets or damaged sections
Clean up debris from ground around house

title: Replace Smoke Detector Batteries
safety: Replace all batteries in home at same time
steps: Press the test button to identify which detector is chirping
Carefully remove detector from ceiling mount by twisting counterclockwise
Remove old battery and note correct orientation
Insert new battery ensuring proper positive/negative alignment
Reattach detector to ceiling mount
Press and hold test button for 2-3 seconds to verify operation
Repeat for all detectors in home

title: Flush Water Heater Tank
safety: Ensure proper ventilation for gas units
steps: Turn off power (electric) or set gas control to pilot
Turn off cold water supply valve to the heater
Connect garden hose to drain valve at bottom of tank
Run hose to floor drain or outside
Open drain valve and let water flow until clear
Close drain valve and remove hose
Turn cold water supply back on
Turn power/gas back on
Wait for tank to refill and reheat
